p: BMDs of the whole as well as the proximal, middle, and distal regions of the femurs of OVX mice were significantly lower than those of the sham group ( Figure 4Aâ€“D). AH-HAS treatment attenuated bone loss in the whole and proximal region of the femur significantly ( Figure 4A,B). There were no significant differences among the OVX groups with regard to the BMD of the middle and distal region of the femur ( Figure 4C,D).
